content: Our digital only circulation revenue of $34.5 million grew 35.4% compared to the prior year on a same-store basis, while ARPU grew approximately 2% year-over-year, we expect to see continued momentum and engagement as we further utilize audience and product analytics to fine tune and personalize our premium and personalize our premium content, optimize our subscriber funnel efficiency, scale our new subscription products, build and launch new subscriber partnerships and apply data science to improve retention and minimize churn.
